Title: Wind Sprints
Plot: The situation in town begins to get ugly as Coach Taylor and his family is forced to endure heat from a difficult loss against the San Marco HS Rattlers.Tim and Tyra break up after he confronts her about Smash, and Lyla, after having an argument with Jason, vents her anger onto Tim.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,offensive language,drug use and sexual references
GuestStars: Michael Robert Tudyk, Marcus M. Mauldin, Toby Metcalf, Sean Hennigan, Allan Graf, Michael Foster, Brian Beal, Hector E. Rodriguez, Aaron Spivey-Sorrells, Aldis Hodge, Mat Greer, Charon R. Arnold, Cynthia Huerta
